name: ikat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a method of dyeing (= adding colour to) thread after tying it, then using it to make cloth with complicated patterns of many colours, or cloth that is made in this way: robes from Uzbekistan made from silk and velvet ikat an ikat technique ikat cloth Compare
batik
tie-dye
